pageContext.claim: “Well, the testing, we did it -- as soon as we found out that it was a problem, we did it.”
pageContext.analysis: The CDC announced that the test had been distributed was providing inconclusive results on Feb. 12. It wasn’t until Feb. 29 that the FDA lifted restrictions on labs, issuing a new set of significantly less restrictive protocols for testing and in effect, opened the door for more widespread testing.
